title: Rhubarb muffins
ingredients: ['120g vanilla yoghurt', '30g butter, melted', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 egg', '165g plain flour', '165g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '120g diced rhubarb', 'Topping', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '4 tablespoons crushed flaked almonds', '2 teaspoons melted butter']
